short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds the ability to add smilies to reply's on NeoGAF.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add some custom smilies to your replies.

A big work in progress. Will make and upload more smilies as time goes by.

To-Do List:

- Add more smilies
- Re-size smilies
- Input a "More" link to display a pop-up containing all of the smilies

Possible Bugs:

- Smilie box only shows up when you create a thread
- Smilie box only shows up when you reply in certain threads


Based off of Andrex's NeoGAF smilies extension.
